Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball made two free-throws to ultimately win the game by a point
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball has been fined $100,000 for making an offensive and derogatory comment in a postgame interview
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Charlotte Hornets logged a win at home over the Milwaukee Bucks 115-114
Others: The Hornets play the undefeated Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday at 6 p.m. ET
